oai_dc:dc.dc:title: One- and Two-Point Codes over Kummer Extensions
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Masuda, Ariane M.
Quoos, Luciane
Sepúlveda, Alonso
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Algebraic Geometry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We compute the Weierstrass semigroup at one totally ramified place for Kummer extensions defined by $y^m=f(x)^{\lambda}$ where $f(x)$ is a separable polynomial over $\mathbb{F}_q$. In addition, we compute the Weierstrass semigroup at two certain totally ramified places. We then apply our results to construct one- and two-point algebraic geometric codes with good parameters.
Comment: Some corrections were made. Final version to appear in the IEEE Transactions on Information Theory
